      • urlMatches

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<okhttp3.Response> urlMatches​(String expression)
        Builds criteria to match url of a response.
        Parameters:
        expression - is a substring that url of a response is supposed to have. It is possible to pass regexp pattern that url should fit.
        Returns:
        criteria.

      • headerValue

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<okhttp3.Response> headerValue​(String name,
                                                                                          String value)
        Checks header of response. It is expected that response has defined header with value that contains defined string.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of header response is supposed to have
        value - is the value of header response is supposed to have
        Returns:
        criteria

      • headerValueMatches

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<okhttp3.Response> headerValueMatches​(String name,
                                                                                                 String valueExpression)
        Checks header of response. It is expected that response has defined header with value that contains string with defined substring / regex.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of header response is supposed to have
        valueExpression - is the substring the header value is supposed to have or the RegExp the header value is predicted to match
        Returns:
        criteria

      • isSuccessful

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<okhttp3.Response> isSuccessful()
        Builds criteria to match http response by status code. A response is expected to have the code is in [200..300), which means the request was successfully received, understood, and accepted.
        Returns:
        criteria.

      • isRedirect

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<okhttp3.Response> isRedirect()
        Builds criteria to match http response. It is expected that a response redirects to another resource
        Returns:
        criteria.
